Package de.oth.blocklib.shaders

Class GlobalUniforms

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.shaders.GlobalUniforms
public class GlobalUniforms
extends java.lang.Object
Author:
Tobias Werner SoSe18 Central data structure to store global shader uniform data, which is the same for all shaders and entities These values are set by the master renderer. Each ShaderProgram can then load whichever values it needs
